title: Riot > Rito !!?
body:
Ok so i'm a bit confused now a few months ago apparently RIOT changed name to RITO, did they change it back or what it never changed? Riot members status is RIOT and the new teasers and things are still RIOT but even though many people call it RITO help me clarify. Is it RIOT or RITO?

{{summoner:2}} Show me what it is

replies.body:
gr8 b8 m8, r8d 8/8
It is a joke in the LoL community. Basically, whenever people want to pick on Riot they say "Rito" instead, as it being misspelled goes well with stuff like "pls" and "y u do dis".
so its Rito? they just haven't gotten around to changing on their teasers and stuff?
